story: In the Gloomwood Realm, the sun has not shone for centuries, as a veil of chaotic shadows wraps around the land, casting eternal night. The vile Shadow Cloaked Specter rules over the undead legions known as The Shadowed Legion, spreading fear and despair. The obsidian serpent shielder, Nyxian Dreadguard, and the venomous beast lord, Slythroth, obey their master's every command, wreaking havoc on any who dare to challenge their darkness.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome to the Gloomwood Realm, brave soul. Prepare to face the eternal night and the malevolent forces that lurk within.
defeatEndingMessage: With the defeat of the Shadow Cloaked Specter, the darkness that shrouded the Gloomwood Realm begins to lift, and rays of sunlight pierce through the sky once more. The world celebrates the victory, and hope is renewed.
gameOverMessage: Defeated by the sinister forces of The Shadowed Legion, the Gloomwood Realm descends further into darkness and despair. The eternal night prevails, and all light fades from this cursed land.
